# language

**Interface Property**

A language ID that determines the language for the search result text.

## Declaration

```swift
language?: string;
```

## Discussion

This overrides the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/ServiceConstructorOptions/language] provided to the [doc://com.apple.mapkitjs/documentation/MapKitJS/Search] constructor.

## Autocomplete search initialization

- **coordinate**: A map coordinate that provides a hint for the geographic area to search.
- **region**: A map region that provides a hint for the geographic area to search.
